EmailTemplate.subject: Youth Board Session Reminder
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello {!Contact.FirstName}!
Due to popular demand we have arranged a very special visit to the Bromley Magistrates court on Wednesday 6th April @ 1:30pm! The visit will comprise of: - Learning about the Law profession and the structure of Magistrates court - A tour of the premises and holding cells - Witnessing an actual court in Session Due to the nature of the visit, there are a few things you need to be aware of to ensure you would be permitted on to the site. -We will be meeting at 1:30pm prompt (if you are late you will be not allowed on the visit) -No personal belongings are allowed on site (small bags permitted and phones must be switched off) - No Food or Drinks may be taken on premises - Appropriate attire must be worn.
We will be meeting outside the court 1:30pm prompt your mentor for the day will be Stephanie and Troy. The address is: The Court House, 1 London Rd, Bromley, BR1 1RA
Look out for the reminder text and we will see you there!
Best,
Bromley and Bexley team
